website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced waterproof speaker that is great for the poolside or outdoor adventures.
pros: Great sound quality and volume considering size
Rated for 12 hours of battery life
Two Flip 5 speakers can be connected to the JBL Connect app for stereo audio
cons: Cannot match high volume levels of others
The mono design is a downgrade from previous models

customer_reviews.title: Best flip so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Have the flip 4 and charge 3 and this one out does both. It’s a bit bigger then the flip 4, but not much and has great balanced sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Hartelius

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed . Only connects with other JBL PartyBoost speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Flip 5 uses JBL PartyBoost, while other recent JBL speakers use JBL Connect+. Therefore, you cannot link the Flip 5 with other JBL speakers besides the Flip 5 (until JBL releases new speakers that have the PartyBoost technology). Very disappointed as that's the reason I purchased the Flip 5 (and waited for it to come out). Check out JBL's Flip 5 question and answer page on their website for further clarification. If you're not worried about linking your other JBL speakers, then the speaker itself has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cobluesky

customer_reviews.title: Strong Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch!! I drive a truck over the road and some of the different company trucks get crap signal. This thing has been a lifesaver for music!!! It's loud even with the windows down in the rig. Wheather you listen to country music or rock, this thing plays with amazing quality.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. I have not tested the waterproof aspect of the speaker yet but I'm so impressed with the sound quality/battery life that i gave it a 5 star across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Frank DeLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Not even close.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see (hear) anything improved in the Flip5; mattera fact, it seems to be heading in the opposite direction. The speaker is mono...who wants to hear something in MONO?? It's not compatible to pair with anything but other Flip5s/Partyboost...connect a hundred or more speakers! (Why?) No voice assistant or speakerphone connectivity, either, if you're into that kind of thing, which I'm not. Bought it for some highly-anticipated sound quality, and was terribly disappointed. Returning tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: SubduedBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Battery not as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, can hear great from about 50ft away only bad thing is battery is not as good as marketing material states. At FULL VOLUME you might get 5 good hrs. If you run it at lowest audible volume you might be able to get the 12 hrs advertised....might....but with that said I am very happy with the speaker...bluetooth works good with all of my devices. Could have a little memory for at least 100 mp3's but that might get battery life down to 3 hrs so I'll let my phone be media source.
customer_reviews.author: DeMac

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in a bicycle water bottle cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bluetooth speaker and I’m really enjoying it. I downloaded the JBL app, it was super easy to connect to my phone, and I use Spotify normally as I would, but I choose the Flip speaker as the sound output. Super easy and a lot of fun. It fits nicely in my bike water bottle cage. I am using the Profile Designs Kage, this bottle cage completely surrounds a bottle (or the speaker).
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Cannot pair to any of my other JBL devices, out of date Bluetooth technology. Older generations are better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Kohlbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best purchase I have ever made. I was skeptical but this little thing exceeded my expectations by far over 1000 percent. Astounding quality, gorgeous color, and the sound quality is extraordinary. If you really want to test thing out, play something by Billie Eilish, the base is incredible. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hemmingway

customer_reviews.title: Mono-only. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Turns out this is a single-driver mono speaker. This is a drastic change from the flip 4.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wittkowski

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Playtime is only about 4 hours at best. Unless you’re listening at minimum levels, 12 hours of playtime is a pipe dream...
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: Used the speaker out of the box until the battery died and just left it on the desk for music,never fell off the table or was near water it just turned off and never turned back on after being charged with all the recommended chargers and cables. The sound was nothing to be impressed about. Sounds exactly as any generic $30 Bluetooth speaker, no defining sound or redeeming qualities, it even has distortion at 50% volume.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few hours then broke
customer_reviews.text: I used the speaker for maybe 5 hours on no more than half volume because even that is pretty loud and the bass blew out and the speaker is worthless now I’m sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect with previous JBL speakers (JBL Flip 4 specifically)
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Does sound good, not sure it's any better the the Flip 4 though. Battery life seems pretty good, but hard to tell since the battery on my flip 4 is going bad. The bad: I bought it specifically to pair with my current JBL Flip 4. However turns out that it is not capable of doing this. Uses USB-C cable, so not compatible with the dozens of other USB cables I have. These two reasons are enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: no 3ml support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a much older jbl portable speaker that wore out after years of use. Bought it specifically for 3ml hookup for job site equipment. Quite disappointed to see the way the price increased recently, but decided to go for it any way. Got it to to find no 3 ml support. You increase price and do not offer basic features. Common sense dictates a 3ml jack for sound equipment for compatibility. Going to stay away from jbl. Couldn't use it so 1 star for all features. In a wheelchair and more important things to do daily than getting to the post office to return it and do not need another paper weight. Trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: donovan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice little speaker, puts out a good sound for such a small package. Feels durable when carrying it around from place to place. It could be louer, given it's price., however the quality of the sound makes up for it. Bluetooth connectivity was great and easy to hook up to your phone. Battery life is ok, max volume will eat it up in about 10 hours. I just wish the speaker had the software to allow its battery indicator show up on my notification bar like other cheaper ones have done.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink with a case to match. Online the speaker and case were the same color, more of a pepto pink. When the speaker arrived I was disappointed. It was more of a dusty rose pink. Very ugly in my opinion, and didn't match the case. I had to return both for a basic black.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke H

customer_reviews.title: Party mode is a joke. Don’t buy 2+ of these.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried factory resetting these babies several times and they still seem to have difficulty staying connected after awhile...sometimes minutes, sometimes hours. The app is the lamest excuse for an app I’ve ever seen. It also doesn’t stay connected to the speakers. These things put out decent sound, but they just don’t work well in party mode, which for me was the biggest reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my JBL charge 2 just died after about five or six years. That was a great sounding speaker that never had connectivity problems. This is not that speaker. No exaggeration, the signal started breaking up when my phone was about six feet away from the speaker. There would be static or other problems every time I typed or did anything else on my phone, even standing right next to the speaker. I am returning this speaker and am not likely to order another JBL, which is too bad because I loved my old one!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: JBL Flip 5 Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time but I finally entered the world of Bluetooth Audio. I can finally listen to tunes while in the garden or garage. I have very bad tinnitus but the sound is fantastic and I’m also very happy with the battery power. I just have to remember to charge it🤷🏻‍♂️. I can’t comment on water resistance because I don’t plan on getting it wet! Bluetooth pairing was flawless and easy even for a tech challenged human like me and the range was great. I’m glad I opted for the Flip 5 and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bohunk

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Flip 4, and it sounded really good. It died after just over 2 years though. So I wasn't enthused about buying another JBL, but was compelled by the color choice, and how easy it is to pair (unlike the Bose I tried). This Flip 5 sounds even better - clearer sound, and more bass - and the dusty rose pink color is beautiful. Just hoping I get more than 2 years out of it...don't want landfill full of bluetooth speakers among all the other items with built-in obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: JBL: Just Blast Loud
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several BT speakers, and been disappointed in ALL of them despite combing through hours of reviews prior. This, this, little guy is rockin'. if ya got the $100, drop it-it' worth it. I like that they included a long enough cord-6' I think. And the case it came in frankly could be used as a protective item in travels as itsextremely sturdy with an attached lid. Not sure how long that will last, but in a pinch ina bag, it will suffice. Good job JBL!, this is my new favorite thing!
customer_reviews.author: ROWDY BIKER

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off on
customer_reviews.text: I loved this speaker for about a week or two. The music is loud and clear and I was able to pair it to my phone with ease. It was exactly what I needed for this quarantine. Unfortunately, it began shutting off on its own. It happened once ,and I ignored it. But, after numerous times, I’m ready to throw in the towel. It’s two weeks old, and I have to factory reset it. I looked online and this is actually common for JBL speaker, so it’s definitely going back.
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE J. PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: rugged compact and built solid.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had Bose in the past and the only reason I went JBL is because its waterproof and as a commercial fisherman, I’m about to start working on crab gear outside/on the coast/obviously it will be raining!I haven’t put it to the test out there yet, but sound quality and bass and clarity even at its highest volume is SUPERB. FOR THE MONEY... it exceeds Bose in my opinion. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.A

customer_reviews.title: Great 360 degree speaker with full sound experience
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this speaker. I was searching for a 360 degree speaker with good fidelity and bass. I had tried a few others and ultimately had to send them back. I got this one and the difference is noticeable. I have not bought a second speaker to use in stereo mode, but for my purposes I don't know that I will. I am very impressed with the full quality sound. If I were using outside for parties, etc I could see purchasing 2 speakers to pair together and place on either side of the space. Overall really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: very nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to listen to music around my swimming pool. connecting to my iPhone was super easy. the sound quality is excellent and exactly what you expect from a reputable company like JBL. which is owned by harmon karmon. the only issue i have is that the battery life seems to be lacking somewhat, but i do like to listen to it on high volume. i get about 5 hours of music when i crank it up to max. middle way you may get 8? over all i think it was 100 bucks well spent and i would recommend it to anyone who wants to listen to portable music. old style radios are such 20th century.LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J.

customer_reviews.title: Really loud. Let’s go for 2nd round
customer_reviews.text: It’s really loud, of which I wanted. I have my kids yelling at me to turn it down cause they can’t handle the awesomeness of my music! Haha! But after listening to songs for a while, it just stops the song out of the blue for no reason. It has done this a total of 3 times. I will ask for a replacement to see if it happens again, of which I hope it doesn’t. Will have another update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholle L Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product... Get the remaining flip 4's or another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Has no speaker phone, loved that feature on flip 4. Party boost can't party with flip 4's connect+... Sound quality a little better but very disappointed in jbl. I use to Bragg on my JBL speakers but quite frankly I feel let down and bamboozled. These are core features that were dropped with no real explanation or warning.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this portable speaker! The camo colors are just awesome! The speaker clarity and volume are great! I love the noise it makes to confirm when it connects to your device. It connects in a split second ,which amazes me. I did think it was bigger when I ordered but it is loud enough for me to really love this thing so far. It also feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Battery failure
customer_reviews.text: It seems i spoke too soon. The speaker is now very hot while plugged in to charge. However, while plugged in, not only is the speaker not charging, it will not stay on. The charge light is blinking, as if it is charging, but will not hold charge long enough to play music. I recently purchased wireless headphones from a discount electronics retailer and the battery was also in similar shape. Acts as if charging but not really charging. This seems to be a common issue. Somehow, retailers are getting faulty products and passing them off to public at discounts.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Barnett

customer_reviews.title: No Auxiliary port
customer_reviews.text: Sucks!! It does not have an auxiliary port to play my Ipod. Yes, Ipod.....I still have one and I have great tunes on it that would be nice to play it through JBL Flip 5.
customer_reviews.author: libragirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Stereo At All; Muddy Mono Audio
customer_reviews.text: Yes, as other reviewers mentioned, it gets AMAZINGLY loud. But that doesn't really matter to me when the stereo input audio signal is spit out from a MONO output. Meaning it sounds AMAZINGLY BAD. I tested it with a pure 100% left-right audio test and there is no difference in sound – it's all coming from one output channel. The result is a very muddy, echo-y sound. Not good for music, not good for anything except making lots and lots of very loud noise. Very disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJDave

customer_reviews.title: I love JBL but this one didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a few JBL Bluetooth speakers. I have had a micro wireless for like 5 years now going strong. I have a Flip 3, Charge 3, a Boombox and this. Unfortunately this one burned out on the third day after I went for a walk with my daughter. The speaker being mono is not an issue and sound quality was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: As far as I can tell, OK sound, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: For a small portable speaker, it has decent sound, not poor, not great. As for durability, I don't think it has much. After owning for just over a month, I bumped it off of my counter-top and it hit the hardwood floor(3ft drop). This caused one of the sub-woofer speakers and the case to separate, because of this I don't dare to test its water-resistance. Being sold as a, portable, water-resistant, party speaker, I would expect it to handle more than just a 3 foot drop before it falls apart. As far as I can tell, OK sound, poor build quality. Not what I expected from JBL.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: We love this powerful little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a lot of wireless speakers over the years and this one is by far the best! It has great sound! It is sturdy like it could take a fall but thankfully we haven't had to year that yet. It has good bass. It's also really easy to use and connects quickly once you set a device up. The first time you connect a new device it takes a minute but once it's set up, it connects really every time you want to use that device. Overall, highly recommend this powerful little speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Weterman

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for under $100!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker! Balanced sound and long 12 hr battery life (if you don’t have the volume maxed out) make this speaker our new family go to speaker for poolside events. The Bluetooth range of 50ft makes DJing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey MacGilfrey

customer_reviews.title: great sound but not as loud as i wanted
customer_reviews.text: product was great, awesome sound, nice and compact. i did return this but only because it was not loud enough for what i wanted my partner has the charge 3 and that was great so i got the CHARGE 4 to replace it. and TBH not a great deal of change in how loud it is sadly. . however im not changing again. both great speakers. i think the sound quality is better on the flip 5. but the charge 4 is slightly louder. i will be keeping the charge 4 but great speakers all round
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose Soundlink II!  And -$50!
customer_reviews.text: Happy purchaser!. I bought this after a close friend bought a different model JBL and I was impressed. After owning a Bose soundlink II, I can safely say there is no letdown whatsoever. In fact I am prepared to say that I believe the JBL to have it over the Bose! Save yourself $50 and get something better with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hemmeke

customer_reviews.title: Replaced the previous lost/stolen one.. still like it just as much
customer_reviews.text: Great product! They run expensive. I had a similar model that got lost or stolen so I am just replacing it. The sound is full and clear. The charge lasts a long time. Very nice unit. You get better results if you place it near, but not touching, a reflective surface (wall or something) and not just out in the open. I even used it in my '03 Subaru on the dash sometimes and it was better than the old stock speakers in that car.
customer_reviews.author: Terry581

customer_reviews.title: Small size, big sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT speaker! Super sound, super base. Battery, however, is NOT. Short usages of an hour or so are fine but if you use till it dies, you CANNOT USE IT even when plugged in. Needs to recharge to almost HALF before will consistently play your tunes. So, if you're going to use for a long time, best to have plugged in constantly. Would NOT be useful say for a day a the beach or at a place with no convenient outlet. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Terrific except for battery life span
customer_reviews.text: I received my flip 5 yesterday. It was partially charged and worked fine upon my testing it. Today I took to work after full charging it the day before. I started using the speaker around 9am and it died around 2pm. So that's roughly 5 hours of music and I had the volume up a little above halfway bc it's actually superbly loud. So why did it die before the 12 hour mark? Not sure. Since it's fully depleted of charge, I figure I will charge it up again and see what happens on a full cycle charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but wish it had bass and treble control.
customer_reviews.text: Since it doesn't, my stereo has a +-5 for treble and bass control. I set the bass to -5, and treble to +1 or +2 for outside listening to mellow rock, spa music and smooth jazz outside. Also, I purchased a WiFi range extender for my electronics; and I think the 5g might be interfering with the speaker as I occasionally get intermittent static and the speaker cuts out. I turn the WiFi extender off when the speaker is in use and that seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing the Ultimate Ears Boom for years, but it's $300 price tag has always stopped me. I bought the Flip 5 after borrowing my friends Flip 4 while kayaking. It's waterproof, holds a long charge, and good sound quality (4/5 star sound). I use it whenever on the water (be aware it doesn't float, but does have a wrist strap), when working in the garage, or renovating my basement. It's great, and I don't have to think about it. Would be great if was Alexa-enabled, but that feature is only useful if you have internet (duh). For the price I paid - cannot imagine a better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers so I could use them in stereo. Happy with my purchase! I have a 2003 Toyota Corolla. The speakers of the car are great, but they only play CD or the radio. Very pleased with the loudness! I wanted speakers that could get really loud so I could hear everything even while driving down the highway with my window open. Pretty good quality, too! They're not Bose speakers, but they're pretty good! These things can shake up your room at full volume without any distortion, as far as I can tell! The speakers feel sturdy and have great weight to them, they feel like they're worth the price holding them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: "Works to pair with other JBL" Except the Flip3
customer_reviews.text: Why even advertise the pairing abilities if this doesn't work with the JBL3? JBL 3 has a bigger battery, boasting 20 hours of life vs the Flip5's 12, has a 3.5mm headphone jack, and has voice assistant capabilities. Do not buy this product, buy the Flip3 instead, I am extremely disappointed that this doesn't work with the JBL3. EDIT: Additionally, "party boost" causes awful latency. Do not try to use these with a TV show, movie, video game, etc... anything with video because the audio will be completely off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection and poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Amazon canceled my review earlier. Said my works are inappropriate. Then fine. I would say it appropriately this time. This is a defect product! Do not buy. The Bluetooth connection are so poor and it lose connection constantly. I tried my laptop, phone and iPad. They all work poorly. I then returned the product, and after a week amazon said I didn’t put the product in the box. Then they send the empty back to me and also say my review is irrelevant of the product. I don’t know what to say, thank you amazon. Very good
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I was going to like the Flip 5 and I don't...I love it and I'm sure my wife does also because now I don't have my computer speakers with wires running around the dining room so I can listen while I'm in the kitchen prepping or cooking, it sounds so good I'm going to buy another to use like stereo because I'm all about good sounding music and now I just turn it on, pick my music and put it right on the counter near me. I put it right in the corner and it kicks up the sound a little so it sounds even better, I'm pretty sure you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker with a few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent portable, Bluetooth speaker. A few tips to keep it in great condition: Go into your smart phone settings and turn on music equilazer. Then with a song playing, find a setting that sounds best at 50% volume. (on my iphone, I selected "jazz" even though I was listening to an R&B song) Turn the Volume Limit to 'on' and adjust as needed. (This is to help prevent blowing out the speaker at higher volume)
customer_reviews.author: Smiles-a-lot

customer_reviews.title: Portable to take it outdoors and that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little speaker so I can use it outdoors, I do have a Bluetooth device and it paired up without any problem. I’m surprised in the quality of sound it puts out for its size but it’s not the top of the line. This speaker will get a lot of use throughout the year, I listen to music a lot. Since it is Bluetooth I can listen to all of my playlists I’ve created so I’m thrilled about that. Overall I’m happy I bought it, the price was affordable and again the quality of sound is good enough for me, I didn’t want to spend the money for a better quality speaker at a overpriced amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Patty F.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot pair with another flip5
customer_reviews.text: they claim there is a connection 'button' but it does not work. Don't bother if you want to pair with another flip5.
customer_reviews.author: hs

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It won't blow your socks off and it is not meant to do so. It is a very good portable speaker, easy to pair, and good sound for its size. For sitting outside with a cocktail on a beautiful night or working in the yard, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: ruxCYtable

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker. Awful charging cable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth “flip” purchase over the last ~7 years. I have owned four and gifted one and I have loved them all - esp the waterproofing and portability. All of my speakers prior to this one came with a high quality, often distinctive orange, charging cable. This one came with a piece of garbage that is so flimsy you can easily insert it backwards into a traditional USB port. I am incredibly disappointed. If you are purchasing this speaker (which is an excellent value for the money), do yourself a favor and buy an extra USB C charger.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL Flip. It works perfectly for my needs. There is an interference issue with the Bluetooth connectivity when my wireless mouse is turned on. I've tried repositioning the speaker, mouse, and computer, but I can't figure it out. Not a huge problem, I just turn the mouse off. I was visiting this product page because I was going to buy a third speaker for my kitchen. I changed my mind when I saw that the price had increased 20% since I bought the second speaker in May - 3 months ago. Really? It reminded me of the difference between want and need. So I just saved money, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Is Stereo mode really Stereo?
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable speaker. I now have a pair, hoping to get a nice stereo sound. I tried numerous times with the JBL app to sync them in stereo but somehow not getting the audio separation when playing the stereo audio test through them. Maybe there is a difference between the party mode and the stereo mode, but it is little hard to discern. Tell us JBL, what is going on with the Stereo mode ?
customer_reviews.author: Mutrony

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has the JBL charge 3 and this one sounds as good as his. It is light, loud, clear, and has nice bass (especially if you like bass in your face). Do not hesitate to buy this JBL! We take it on the kayaks and it is loud and sounds cool under the water when you swim lol. Love my lil speaker. Also the battery kicks a**!!!!!!!!!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bell

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Speakers do not pair well with JBL Connect App - Skips speeds music up awful
customer_reviews.text: I have owned JBL speakers in the past and looked forward to the purchase. I bought 2 Flip 5 units to pair them in stereo and unfortunately the app that manages this is not working properly. I tried to pair / unpair the two speakers many times , delete the app, upload again, remove speakers from bluetooth and add again, nothing works. I contacted JBL on Monday and I replied immediately to their auto e-mail that I needed to reply to and they still have not gotten back to me. Great sound if they would actually play correctly but ultimately a TERRIBLE Product and Equally Bad Customer Support. Good Bye JBL, I'm moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: This is a WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally heard this while down the Jersey shore (Wildwood) this past summer. I thought music was being pumped from the boardwalk because the treble was very crisp and the bass sounded fat and rich. Little did I know it was a gal playing tunes about 20ft from us, she showed me the unit and I couldn't be more impressed of the speakers concert hall like sound. It charges in about 2 hours and the battery lasts about 12 hours. Whether loud or soft there's a lot of sound, amazing from a small unit. I paid around $80 on Amazon, you can't go wrong with the JVC FLIP5. If you have 2 units they will sync to play in stereo.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: A Misstep By A Famous Brand
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that JBL changed platforms to make this new generation incompatible with previous generation portable speakers. The bass subwoofer is hugely powerful and not easily adjustable. A pair of the mono speakers linked will fill a room with huge sound. You should ONLY connect one via Bluetooth. They “pair” with others with a push of a button on the speaker itself. The treble is soft, but the subwoofer will rock your walls. You have to turn them in the orientation you want for your music. Putting the subwoofer end pointed up on both will rock your world, but mot necessarily in a good way.....
customer_reviews.author: dacrowesq

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I just got this JBL flip5. It was super easy to pair to my phone. It sounds really, really good! - It can be loud enough to have to shout to be herd over it. It has a decent amount of bass for a small(ish) speaker. It is about the size of a beer can and a half. I also purchased a silicone case for protection and ease of carrying. I don't know about battery life yet. I just got it. I bet the pairing of more than one (which is a feature this could do) would be really cool. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! The sound is great, it’s small and portable. Brought it to a party their speaker system went out and this little guy helped keep the tubes going. Also my son thought throwing things into the pool is fun this was one of the object and it dries off quickly and continued to work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound, You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and value. Upgrading from JBL Flip 2 and original jawbone jambox. Was looking in the $30-60 range but ended up choosing the flip5 since the flip 2 has never failed me. The sound is waaaay better than both Flip2 and OG jambox. I use it on my Lanai, perfect sound for all types of music. Hip hop, rap, country, alternative, classic rock, classical, electronic, show tunes all sound great. You can cheap out, or you can go high end with the smart higher end speakers (Sonos, bose, etc). but I think this is best mix of quality and value if you just want a high quality sounding speaker to pairnto your device.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mays

customer_reviews.title: Solid speaker, many connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, great battery, works well alone. Now, the connection issues of trying to get multiple speakers at once is absolutely unacceptable. First, you can't connect to older models, which would be excusable if the the connection method was seamless. However, trying to use the connect app to set up stereo between just two speakers hardly ever works. I have two of these speakers. They are constantly falling out of sync. I would recommend waiting until JBL works out it's kinks on new speakers before purchasing, pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: JBL for the win, baby!!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to speakers, it's all about the popular brands, like Beats by Dr. Dre, etc. But this speaker is without a doubt the best speaker I've ever gotten my hands on. When my clumsy self dropped it multiple times, the speaker still works as if brand new and was never dropped in the first place! The sound is great. The durability is insane. But most of all, the volume is BEYOND BOOMING AND LOUD! No static WHATSOEVER! Best money I've spent on a bluetooth speaker, which by the way, has the best bluetooth range!
customer_reviews.author: Betina

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: I think I made the best choice with this product. I checked some reviews first, and all promised no frills, all performance, and that's exactly what I got. Yes, I could've paid a lot less, but would have gotten a lot less sound, volume, and quality, or would have had to go bigger and bulkier. Instructions and connection were simple, even for me. Very happy with this purchase, and hooked it to my very tiny media stand on wheels in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mallika

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My old JBL 2 was not holding the charge without being plugged in (it was 3 years old). This was the next option and I do like it. Great sound and it fits in the same case I had for the JBL 2. The charge port is different than the last chord though.
customer_reviews.author: Throw it in the Bag

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, volume, and truly waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: My husband decided to take his brand new birthday gift and jump directly into the pool with it so that he could "make sure it was waterproof". Well, it is! It played underwater which was fun for the whole family, and still functions perfectly months later. We ended up buying another one of these and we love connecting them with the Party Boost function!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Benincasa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed a little ... sound is great though
customer_reviews.text: The photo is way off as far as color goes for the pink ... it’s more of a mauve ... I wanted the baby pink :( ... also it cut off so I’m trying to figure out if it was because it was dead ... although I have it on a charger ... so that was weird ... I’ll update the review if necessary **UPDATE : so the speaker does glitch a tad & when it needs to charge it makes a really bad static sound ... not as loud as the JBL charge 4 though ... although prices are similar
customer_reviews.author: Sade Jackson-Bey

customer_reviews.title: it's loud and it connects easily
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars is a rare rating for me. I only use 5 when a product exceeds my expectations. The flip 5 does. Bought one for my wife for Christmas, and we liked it so much I got one for myself. connects quickly and reliably. it's more than loud even with a fair amount of ambient noise present. no fuzzy bass. Feels expensive when you make the purchase but once you have it you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: badbitbucket

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: JBL has done it well, I think, it's better than flip 4. But it could be better. Flip 5 has a mono sound, it's a disadvantage when i compared to any other products. Sometimes the sound not satisfying in terms of quality, especially bass-mid balance because bass is very dominant and when the volume is at top. Though, I'm happy to buy that speaker, I'm using at home at low levels of loudness so it fits to anyone who wants use that speaker in small rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik Talha Gözden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound from a little tube
customer_reviews.text: Good size - good weight - feels like a quality speaker. Sound is amazing - really has a nice thump for such a little tube. I charged it completely up overnight - used it and used it used it - even for a party - so hours and hours of play...it just kept on ticking...nice volume range as well - sounds great loud - no distortion. If this is the type of speaker you are looking for and in your price range (@ 100 when I purchased) - buy with confidence! UPDATE = battery lasts and lasts...
customer_reviews.author: Breaktop22

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker that I bought before our trip to the beach. Used it every day we were out there and the sound is great. It’s not a Bose, but it’s really really decent. Use it all the time, especially when I’m outside in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Powhatan, VA

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is an amazing speaker - the perfect solution to our problem
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome - gives us sound where we need it, and very CLEAR sound! We work in a noisy room and this allows everyone to hear the people on the other side of our Teams calls perfectly clearly. You can't believe how much easier our meetings are now. Volume controls are simple and effective. Bluetooth connected in a nanosecond - soooo nice. Extremely portable - easy to place. This is now a MAINSTAY of all our meetings.
customer_reviews.author: jeff in beaverton

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for size and portability
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a JBL Pulse, which had absolutely no bass. This Flip 5 fixed that problem. Overall sound is good for the size and the mini subs on the end move quite a bit. Pretty good for the price and I was able to play from an iPad that was inside the other side of the house while out on my front porch. Unit is small and portable. Play/pause, skip song, volume and bluetooth buttons all are clearly marked and work as expected. No real need for a manual.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Clicking sound, cuts out
customer_reviews.text: I thought at first it was great. But then it started making a clicking sound, and cutting out on Zoom meetings. I went online and found this is a frequent problem. The advice was, when the speaker does this, to turn it off and then turn it on... Did that, and it worked without that glitch.... For awhile. Then it would start again. My internet connection is good, no problems. So, I think it is the speaker. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Get two (or more) and pair. Stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. Looses Bluetooth signal frequently. For no reason. Lots of experimentation and it’s the speakers. Otherwise. Old review Oh yes! Excellent sound quality and battery life! I got two and paired them...STEREO!!!! Only downside is the Bluetooth signal disconnects randomly for no apparent reason.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: To claim these speakers are "stereo" is misleading. What JBL calls "party mode" is just mono - both speakers play the same sounds without stereo separation. Can't get them to play left and right separately. Individually they sound ok, but not as good as my Sony. Disappointed. A shame that a once respected name brand has been reduced to mediocrity.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, crisp, room-filling sound from compact speaker
customer_reviews.text: This wireless speaker is rather compact but the sound quality is outstanding. It fills the room and the sound is crisp, clear, powerful. I ended up buying a second one for my wife who wanted one for her office at work. Extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wings83

customer_reviews.title: I sad it didnt work out
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was really good I was liking this speaker. It had a bigger fuller sound than my old Bose soundlink. Unfortunately after two days it started skipping and cutting out. I tried a factory reset and all the troubleshooting options but no luck. I was sad to have to return it. Looking at overall reviews showed a fair amount of people had problems with connectivity and battery life so I ended up buying a Sony speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My mom almost stole it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved my white one so much I bought her the prettier blue one. I almost want to steal hers! Love these handy little speakers, they have wildly better audio quality that my Echo/Alexa devices and I love just carrying it around with me. I find I can concentrate while working from home better with this speaker. Bluetooth could be a bit better range-wise but it would still be plenty fine for a day at the pool
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: can't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: I have friends with Bose, no need, save some money this little box is all you need....great It come is a foam carrying case that is difficult to put the speaker in/out.....they must want us to buy the "real"carrying case. I have a music bag for the beach with support battery, cables etc.... I read something like this; have a Bose ? don't trade, Have a JBL? don't trade
customer_reviews.author: waldo

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Boat Stereo System Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the stereo in my boat. It dawned on me that I could just get a couple of these and daisy chain them together and play from my phone. Worked perfectly. These are fantastic speakers. Super easy to use, they chain together with by just touching one button. Once they are all connected, they respond to volume controls together. Sound quality is awesome. They pack quite a punch, even when out playing on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A. Tycksen

customer_reviews.title: Great BT speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and connect them in stereo using the JBL Connect app on my Ipad Pro and Google Pixel 3XL. It works in stereo on either one just fine. Sounds incredibly good. Great bass, midrange and treble. Sound like they are already EQed perfectly right out of the box. Great stereo separation as I can put the speakers far apart. They sound bigger than they are. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Acer

customer_reviews.title: An amazing speaker -- and you can connect them together!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea when buying this speaker that because of their "JBL Connect" technology, you can connect JBL speakers to each other to have music playing from the same source through multiple speakers. So awesome! I only have one for now, but plan to get another eventually. As to the sound, I was immediately impressed by the full range of sound that comes out of this thing; actual bass out of a bluetooth speaker? Imagine that! This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker by far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been planning to buy a jbl speaker for a long time. As a kid my mother had a huge jbl speaker that I loved, so I wanted the same experience with a fraction of the size. I’ve only had this for a day and I am blown away with what this tiny speaker sounds like. I’m probably gonna but this same speaker for the rest of my life. I haven’t tried the connect feature but I will once I get my hands on another jbl. I love mine so much (I got green camo)
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and powerful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Finally received my JBL on time delivery was fast I am so excited needed this for when i take my girls to the park i have some music it sound wonderful nice base to it and very loud. It not heavy on the hands and very convenient for me. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Kick-Ass bass and wide soundstage
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is the best speaker you can buy for under $100. My aunt has a JBL Flip 4, so I had high expectations for the speaker. I can tell you that I'm amazed at how loud this speaker gets and pure the sound clarity is at full blast. While standing a few feet away from the speaker, I could feel the base in my diaphragm and half volume. I kid you not, the bass kicks ass and sounds like a live concert. And the best part, it's roughly the size of a beer can. My God. If you're considering buying this speaker, do it right now while it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product to get on sale
customer_reviews.text: Its a small speaker so don't think your getting something that will blow your mind on sound, it can pump out some alright bass for dance, and hip hop songs, it can does surprisingly well with rock and metal songs. The battery life is no where near what they say, even after a full charge after receiving it, it lasted about 4 hours with constant usage on high volume. The Bluetooth has decent range about 20 feet away is where I was getting connection issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a little package
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. Has great sound quality and base for being so little. I definitely did a lot of comparing across websites when replacing my Bose color speaker, and this one has some of the best reviews for the value! And it holds true. Easy to connect to, easy to use. Holds charge for quite a while. Only thing I don’t like is that the charger isn’t universal. I have to keep the charge cord around because it’s the only one I have in my house that is so specific. Small price to pay for great sound though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Nice punch, definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Speaker packs a nice punch for the size. Bass response is great when you’re sitting in close proximity. However, at a distance, the sound does not punch as nicely. Bluetooth range reaches much farther than my previous cheaper speaker (at least 55 feet with no static). Also, I left this outside in the pouring rain one night by accident, and it still worked, so I guess it really is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY, POS!!!! Doesn't pair with my Qualcomm Bluetooth transmitter. Both devices are bt v4.2 and other (cheaper) bt speakers work fine so it's NOT the transmitter. I'm a long time JBL fan and have pair of 150A that are the centerpiece of my old school sound system that rocks. VERY disappointed that JBL no longer means quality. WTF happened?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car
customer_reviews.text: I have an old car and need to play my iPhone music via bluetooth for a 21 hour car trip. This worked out perfect. I popped it up on the dashboard and enjoyed hours of music. Nice sound and beat having to upgrade an old car that I'll be selling soon.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice to hear the music
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. I am very happy with my JBL Flip-5 speaker. The sound is surprising for the size! I connect my i-phone, or my laptop and it sounds great. I haven't had the time to try it out on the boat, but plan to. My friend and my son have a larger version, but I am very pleased with this one - I can take it about anywhere. I have recommended my brother to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Schunter

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound, long battery life and great and volume control!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I wanted an external speaker to play some of my music through in order to play along with guitar! This is a concert wrapped up in a very small package!!! On a scale of 1-10... It's an 11!!! Seriously! I'm going to buy more and do the chain link system with them!!! Out on lake, so much fun! PS, and yes, they are waterproof for sure!!! 100%
customer_reviews.author: Dboss4noone

customer_reviews.title: Super Tough
customer_reviews.text: Packs a fierce punch! Pound for pound this baby packs a lot of sound. I’ve read some reviews saying it’s not loud enough. Those people are ridiculous because this thing is about 3/4 the length and diameter of a forearm and it will simply rock your lame ass! It’s also super stout and durable. It is clearly well-made. What are ya wait in’ for? Go on, get one! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marieka Holley

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Could Have Been A Great Speaker If It Didn't Go Backwards
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the Flip 4 Features. Are Not Available On The Flip 5. Like Speaker Phone. Honestly The Flip Four Is Louder. Much Louder But I Guess The 5 Gave Up Some Loudness To Make It Last Longer Battery Wise. Pairing The Speaker Is Also Glitchy. When i Connected To My Friends Own. Which was also a Flip 5. I don't know about the connecting with other brands. i haven't tried it but other comments say it doesn't. So my opinion if you want a better cheaper speaker go for the Flip 4. If you want to just be up to date or features not that important. Then go with the 5.
customer_reviews.author: Trap

customer_reviews.title: JBL FLIP 5 - Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black (New Model)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. He takes it with him a lot of the time. Easily connects with cell phones, charges fairly quickly, last a good amount of time, and sounds great. I got it at a good price, it shipped quickly, and is very comparable to a Bose bluetooth speaker. I know because I have a bose. I would recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: bioresp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For the price it sounds great with great battery life. The water resistance is good enough to leave it in the bathroom during showers. The speaker is covered in a fabric that looks great but does absorb water so I'd be afraid to get it too wet as perhaps it could damage the speaker and it definitely would stay wet for a while. USB-C is a great addition as well and the battery lasts forever; I go weeks without charging it usually playing music and podcasts at about medium volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of everything an active, outdoor person could want in a speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Best waterproof speaker I’ve ever heard. Great sound, and bass. I wanted one after my brother bought the same kind, however didn’t really want to spend the money. Then someone accidentally dropped it in the salt water pool and it kept playing. The speaker still works after a month. I decided to buy one and absolutely love it!!! Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamarakian

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic. The sound is amazing and the battery lasts longer then any other portable speaker we've purchased (which is SEVERAL). I listened to this speaker all day while I painted the house and I was shocked that it never died. We also take this speaker out on our boat and it's a great size for portability and music sounds great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Good volume. Imho battery life should always be stated at max volume at disclosed max descibles for comparison purpose. Overstated battery life. The reason for the 3 , no flat surface to keep it from rolling around . In the boat or car it rolls off the dash . Same issue in the boat and on the lanyard it swings around to much.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lineberry

customer_reviews.title: Wow.... just.... wow.....
customer_reviews.text: Insane sound quality for something so small. I drug my feet for a long time in buying a Bluetooth speaker because I figured I'd be disappointed but this thing is amazing. Crisp highs and tons of base. Clear a bell even at very high volume. I can't believe how loud it goes - and with no distortion at all. I've always been a fan of JBL and this is just another mark in the win column.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

product_meta.title: JBL FLIP 5 - Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black (New Model)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackTake your tunes on the go with the powerful JBL Flip 5. Our lightweight Bluetooth speaker goes anywhere. Bad weather? Not to worry. With its waterproof design, you can rock out to our signature sound Rain or shine. Move more. Pair two JBL party boost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL party boost-compatible speakers to create a bigger party. Enjoy more than 12 hours of play time for your favorite music. Stand it vertical or horizontal and be bold with your choice of 11 vibrant colors.
feature_bullets: Pair multiple speakers with party boost

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars8,302 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #16 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#227 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
